benchmark_details.name: EgoTextVQA
benchmark_details.overview: EgoTextVQA is a novel and rigorously constructed benchmark for egocentric QA assistance involving scene text. It contains 1.5K ego-view videos and 7K scene-text aware questions that reflect real user needs in outdoor driving and indoor house-keeping activities.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a benchmark for research on egocentric scene-text aware QA assistance.

data.source: EgoTextVQA dataset created from ego-view videos sourced from RoadTextVQA and EgoSchema.
data.annotation: Manually reviewed and refined by human annotators

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is calculated as the percentage of correctly answered questions.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance in answering scene-text aware questions.
methodology.baseline_results: Best-performing model Gemini 1.5 Pro achieves around 33% accuracy.
methodology.validation: Timestamps are set for each question, and models are evaluated based on their answers derived from the video content prior to the question's timestamp.
